idiri janadhipathiwaranayedi dekata bedunahoth pohottuwata ha shrilanipayata niyatha parajayak athwana bawin jayagrahanaya sandaha maithri - mahinda sandhanayak aniwaryayenma bihiwiya yuthu bawa prakasha kala ema manthriwaraya, ee sambandhayen mewanawita deparshayema bahutharayaka gen yahapath prathicharayak labi athayi da kiya sitiyeya. 19 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaya yatathe wathman janadhipathiwarayage dhura kalayen pasu janadhipathiwarayage balaya awama wi agamathiwarayata wadi balayak himiwima mewani ekangathawayak athikara ganimata behewin iwahalwi athayi pawasu ema manthriwaraya, kesewuwada danata pawathi sakachja wala ekangathwaya anuwa me wasara awasanwimata pera janadhipathiwaraya wisin mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi kala yuthu bawada ohu wadiduratath kiya sitiyeya.

maname wicharayen pasu dosthara kisi witaka ee gana wachanayak wath nokiyannata parissam wiya.maname kathawa thamata kiyawimata dime aramunada lekhakayata etharam apahadili nowuni.ee haraha sthriwadaya nam 'wihiluwata' thama patalawa pasuwa gahanun gana,pawul jiwithaya gana,minisa swabhawadharmaye pradhana niyamayak wu pawathma aarakshakaraganime wagakima paharaharima barapathala waradak bawa,aadaraya premaya wani hangim hudek minisage pawathma sadharanikaranaya kirimata swabhawadharmayen dayada lesa dena labana homona saha molaye rasayanika wenaswim kiyana thanata sirith paridi dosthara wisin sakachchawa meheyawana bawa lekhakaya hondinma daththeya.ethanata gena eemata pera dostharata muladima daragatha nohaki wana paridi paharadi mella kirima ohuta aththenma awashya wi thibunu deyaki.homona,jaiwa rasayanaya gana dostharata thibune nonithma lekhakayata wada wruththimaya danumaki.nodanna deyak gana eya hondinma danna pudgalayaku ha wadayata yamedi eya wenathakata harawima ho ayale yawima lekhakaya dostharata wada praguna kara siti deyaki.maknisada yath lekhakayage wruththiya pamanak nowa winodanshayada goda nangi thibune ee haraha bawini.aththa washayenma 'sthriwadaya' thanikarama wihiluwak nathinam 'purushoththamawadin' wisin gahanunta patawana lada thawath ugulak bawa lekhakaya hondin watahagena sitiyeya.
